name: .RSR
summary: Learn about .RSR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an RSR file with Rolling Sky Remake (multiplatform). To do so, open the game, click the Play button, and then click the Import button. You can then navigate to and import your RSR file. After you do, the level the file contains will appear in Rolling Sky Remake's level selection menu.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .rsr file in Rolling Sky Remake
images.caption: RSR file open in Rolling Sky Remake
